trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> Web server control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> object associated with this designer.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
Creates a template editing frame using the specified verb.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb"></xref> for which to create the template editing frame.
A template editing frame.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridDesigner"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.

When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, the Dispose method releases all the resources held by the managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridDesigner> object references.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only the unmanaged resources.
Gets the cached template editing verbs available to the designer.
An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb"></xref> objects consisting of the cached template editing verbs that are available to the designer.
Gets the HTML markup used to represent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control at design time.
The HTML markup that is used to represent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control at design time.
Gets the HTML markup used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.
The HTML markup used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.
Gets the HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception when an error has been encountered while rendering the control.
The exception that occurred.
The HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception.
Gets the data item property of the template container.
The GetTemplateContainerDataItemProperty method is obsolete.
To access the template metadata, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.
The name of the template.
The data item property of the container of the template.
Gets the content of the template.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame"></xref> from which to get the content.
The name of the template.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the template's content can be edited; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the content is read-only.
The content of the template.
Gets the <xref:System.Type> object corresponding to the parent of the specified template.
The GetTemplatePropertyParentType method is obsolete.
To access the template metadata, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.
The name of the template.
The <xref:System.Type> corresponding to the parent of the specified template.
Initializes the designer with the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
The control element being designed.
Called when the columns of the template change.
Called when the template editing verbs change.
Sets the content for the specified template and frame.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame"></xref> to set the content for.
The name of the template.
The new content for the template.
